People that still make jokes about Steven Gerrard slipping is bad people. Too much is made about the slip. People say that cost Liverpool the league title that year, but it didn't. They lost 2-0 to Chelsea that game, AND what really cost them was the defense. I mean CMON NOW! Skrtel and Sakho in defense in a title winning team? No chance. With Van dijk and Gomez that year, Liverpool would have killed the title race a long time before the Chelsea game. Gerrard was not the one who cost Liverpool the title. He was immense that year as ALWAYS. What a legend. What a captain. And even tho I'm not a Liverpool fan, I admire that guy so much. The loyalty, the desire, the shots, the passing, the passion. The guy was immense his whole career. He didn't win the league, but he won every other trophy possible, and he turned down Chelsea, Milan and Real Madrid to play for his boyhood club. Stevie G was fantastic, and I dont care what anybody says.
